DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the potential of elastography for noninvasive assessment of fibrosis in renal allograft.
DOC.brief_title: Renal Allograft : Evaluation of Parenchymal Fibrosis by Elastography
DOC.criteria: Renal allograft performed less than 3 months before enrolment Contraindication to magnetic resonance imaging Contraindication to biopsy
